attributes.title: AWFUL APP ❌
attributes.review: Ok so I attempted to download this horrible failure of an app 69 weeks ago and it JUST NOW SHOWED UP on my phone. I then opened the app and it told me that Trump was a racist 😵 which is true of course but it’s just awful that he’s promoting it on his own app!! Next the app held my dog for ransom and it took my money to pay for trumps horrible campaign!! All in al DO NOT DOWNLOAD this app. It’s disgusting and it will kill your entire family.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!
attributes.review: This was the worst app I’ve ever had! It took up all my storage and hacked my phone. I couldn’t even click on other apps because it completely destroyed my phone! I had to get a whole new phone which costed so much money! This app should be removed immediately! It frustrates me how this app is allowed to still be on the App Store! This is so dangerous and damaging to phones!

attributes.title: i hate it
attributes.review: the worst app i have EVER downloaded. it glitched all the time it was basically useless. when I clicked on it my phone shut off? is someone hacking my phone? i will sue. please get this awful app off the store before it happens to someone else. this app is a waste of storage and has no real purpose. it’s a bunch of junk. did not fulfill to my satisfaction i am awfully upset.

attributes.title: BEWARE
attributes.review: This is the worst app ever! Do not download under any circumstance! I downloaded this app and started using it like normal, I was completely content. Then, I had put my phone down to go cook dinner when I heard a loud noise. I went in my room to see what happened, and my phone exploded! It destroyed all my stuff around it 😡😡! I had to get a new phone and replace a lot of stuff in my room!!! Super mad!!

attributes.title: THE WORST
attributes.review: I really thought that that this app would help me learn more about the campaign however I’m left confused and appalled. For a president who claims to be the best choice for 2020 this horribly designed app shows otherwise. Everything is in all-caps and there is nothing that shows Trump’s plan to “Make America Great Again.” You tried 💗⭐️🧚🏼 now stop 🌸💫✨ no seriously don’t run for re-election 🦋☀️🧚🏾‍♀️

attributes.title: Ban this app NOW
attributes.review: Terrible app. Truly am beyond disappointed and unsatisfied with the way it works. Can’t believe anyone would ever think of downloading such a horrible app. Promoting voting for Trump? Such a bad idea. Thank you for taking your time to read this. I truly think this app should be taken down. To add as well, so many bugs? I see Trumps face everywhere and it’s horrible. Truly gut wrenching.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE AND DISTURBING
attributes.review: Ok, so I downloaded the app for the next rally and well, when I opened it there was a Cheeto getting a spray tan naked!! Like disturbing 🤢 and the worst thing is is I got out of that app and my home and lock screen was a Cheeto and I just can’t even he is gross and that is a horrible thing to do to the app what if there was a little kid opening the app on their mommy’s phone? And they had to see that like worst app EVER

I feel safer putting my number on Craigslist than this app. It is shocking to see I have to agree to terms to use. ABSOLUTELY NOTTT. My phone is ringing non stop and text on and on again my dog looks at me funny, when he sees it is coming from this app. Overall save yourself and your time and that goes for the gen z’s, millennials, boomers, and families everywhere. Don’t do it it’s not worth it. Es marta hastat America en ashkova tali.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE
attributes.review: this app is terrible if i could  I would give it zero stars but it took several days to download and whenever I signed in it hacked all Of my stuff then it said to vote Trump so we can kill everyone and then it said trump willDestroy you if you don’t vote for him please please please do not download this app well you can then give it a one star thank;) and my tiktok  is  @...perrytheplatypus

attributes.title: DO NO IT WILL DESTROY YOU
attributes.review: I wanted to download it because duh our president but it asked to share my location and I was like whatever he’s our president so I did and then these aliens appeared on my house and they were taking me to a UFO and I saw trump there with many children and they put all of us in the UFO and they kept on feeding us for they can eat us but I succeeded on getting out of the UFO and I got powers and flew off
